metadata.title: CVE-2018-7870 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in getString inutil/decompile.c in libming 0.4.8 for CONSTANT16 data. The vulnerabilitycauses a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
